name: Roto-Rescue
description:
Roto-Rescue is a game where you rescue goobers in perilous situations with your helicopter armed with dangerous equipment. This game is a physics based puzzle game where the player pilots a helicopter in 2.5D space and uses hazardous tools to save lives. Don't forget to fill out our feedback form once you've played:

This game is currently in development, stay tuned to see what becomes of Roto-Rescue!
